content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(35-41, -87)
Complex mining setup consisting of:
- 3 Burner mining drills at positions (37.0, -85.0), (39.0, -85.0), and (41.0, -86.0)
- Storage chests at positions (34.5, -86.5), (36.5, -86.5), (40.5, -87.5), and (39.5, -83.5)
- Burner inserters at positions (35.5, -86.5) and (35.5, -85.5) for coal movement
All drills are currently out of fuel but positioned over coal resources

### Iron/Copper Mining and Smelting at position(-28, -61)
Mining and smelting setup with:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0, -61.0) mining copper and iron ore
- Storage chest at (-27.5, -59.5) collecting ore
- Stone furnaces at (-27.0, -58.0), (-23.0, -58.0), (-21.0, -58.0)
- Burner inserters at (-26.5, -59.5), (-25.5, -58.5) moving materials
- Output chest at (-24.5, -58.5) collecting plates

### Iron Mining Complex at position(-10, -59)
Large iron mining setup with:
- 3 Burner mining drills at (-10.0, -59.0), (-8.0, -59.0), (-6.0, -59.0)
- Storage chests at (-9.5, -57.5), (-7.5, -57.5), (-5.5, -57.5)
- Transport belt system connecting components
- All drills currently out of fuel

### Smelting Array at position(0-6, 0)
Large smelting setup consisting of:
- 4 Stone furnaces at (0.0, 0.0), (2.0, 0.0), (4.0, 0.0), (6.0, 0.0)
- Input chests at (0.5, -2.5), (2.5, -2.5), (4.5, -2.5), (6.5, -2.5)
- Output chests at (0.5, 2.5), (2.5, 2.5), (4.5, 2.5), (6.5, 2.5)
- Multiple burner inserters managing material flow
- Connected transport belt system

### Power Generation at position(4.5, 20.5)
Power setup including:
- Steam engine at (4.5, 20.5)
- Boiler at (-1.5, 22.0)
- Offshore pump at (-3.5, 27.5)
- Pipe network connecting components
- Small electric pole network distributing power

ERROR TIPS

### Extraction errors
- Cannot extract from positions that don't contain the requested item
- Verify item existence in target container before attempting extraction

### Entity placement conflicts
- Check if target position is clear before placing new entities
- Remove blocking entities if needed before placement

### Resource management
- Multiple mining drills are out of fuel - ensure consistent fuel supply
- Some chests are reaching capacity - implement better output management

### Fluid system issues
- Steam engine shows "no input liquid" - ensure proper pipe connections
- Verify fluid flow direction in pipe networks

### Belt management
- Some transport belts are blocked - clear jams to maintain flow
- Ensure proper belt connections between components
